Title: WJ's Windows Phone User Controls
Description: This project built on Windows Phone OS 7.1, it contains list of commonly used WP user controls in my daily projects like iPhone style toggle switch etc.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

This project built on Windows Phone OS 7.1, it contains list of commonly used WP user controls in my daily projects like iPhone style toggle switch etc.

Till now the WP user controls this project brings you are Rounded Corner TextBox, Rounded Corner Button, PIN InputBox and Toggle Switch. Please see below for the details. If you feel these user controls are useful or if you have any trouble using them please leave a comment to let me know.


Currently supported user controls and their screenshots are listed below:

Rounded Corner Button with heading and tail image icon support

Rounded Corner TextBox with water mark support
